response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount from its true value, which I believe is well above $800,000. I understand that the worth of this product may be subjective to you, but I assure you that it has been meticulously crafted and possesses qualities that are unparalleled. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product.", "product_price": 750000}
